notes_examples: I'm Anna. This is my friend Tom. Nice to meet you.
name, age, country, nationality, job, address/phone/email
What's your name/number? Where are you from? How old are you?
How much is it? I'd like…; numbers, money, some/any
Can I have a coffee? A bottle of water, please.
What's the time? At 7 o'clock; on Monday; in May
Where is the station? Go straight, turn left/right; next to, between
He is tall; a small red car; It's big/new/old
I like pizza. I don't like coffee. I want to go home.
Would you like…? Let's go to the cinema.
I can swim. Can I open the window?
I'm going to visit my friend on Saturday.
Let's meet at 6. See you on Friday.
